New Records: CJ McCollum tied his career-high with 50 points.
CJ McCollum made 10 three-pointers, tying his franchise high.
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 50 points to help the Pelicans defeat the Wizards 132-120.
Trey Murphy scored 17 points and Yves Missi had 12 points and 11 rebounds for the Pelicans.
Jordan Poole scored 24 points for the Wizards but was affected by a hard fall, scoring only five more points after the incident.
Rookie centre Alexandre Sarr scored 19 points for the Wizards.
Pre-Game Insights: A moment of silence was held before the game in New Orleans due to a deadly New Year’s Day attack in the French Quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans tied a season-high with 18 made three-pointers, going 18 of 41.
New Orleans benefitted from the return of reserve guard Jose Alvarado, who contributed five points, three assists, and three steals in 20 minutes after missing 23 games.
Others: The Pelicans have the NBA's worst record at 6-29, now sharing the fewest victories in the league with Washington (6-26).
